communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Governor Office Query
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

An email communication, sent or received, in the official email account of Sheriff Anthony Scardina, that contains the word "Newsom" or "Governor".

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson

title: Governor Newsom & 81 Fernhill Avenue (California Highway Patrol)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The budget and costs for Dignitary Protection Section services at 81 Fernhill Avenue, Ross CA between June 24th, 2024 to November 22nd, 2024

The budget and costs for Dignitary Protection Section services for the Newsom Family  between June 24th, 2024 to November 22nd, 2024

The budget and costs for Dignitary Protection Section services for the Siebel Family between June 24th, 2024 to November 22nd, 2024

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson
